column4: Has anybody else had trouble with full screen flash video freezing the xserver in Natty?
That is a known Flash issue. Try opening your Flash preferences and disabling hardware acceleration.
thanks ^^ you have a link to a case or anything?
Google fullscreen flash linux and you'll have millions of hits.
yeah most of those are ancient though :/
Ancient, but still very relevant. The problem has not been solved on even the newest version of Flash, the newest version of Ubuntu, and the newest Linux kernel.
